Title: BIND: Denial of service
Synopsis:
A vulnerability in BIND might allow remote attackers to cause a
    Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: BIND (Berkeley Internet Name Domain) is a Name Server.

Description.Text: A defect in BINDâ€™s handling of responses containing a DNAME answer can cause a resolver to exit after encountering an assertion failure in db.c or resolver.c.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted DNS request to the BIND resolver possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.
